#{proCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_expectation = #{proExpectation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_star_time = #{proStarTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_complete_time = #{proCompleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_total = #{proTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, investment_amount = #{investmentAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layer_struct = #{layerStruct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expect_time = #{expectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expect_rate = #{expectRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avg_term = #{avgTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, large_term = #{largeTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_default_rate = ,investment_characteristics= #{investmentCharacteristics,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,exit_mode= #{exitMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select distinct pid.id as id, pid.pro_id as proId, if(pid.pro_type=4,pid.system_name,pid.pro_name) as proName, pid.pro_type as proType, pid.order_id as orderId, pid.`status` as proState, DATE_FORMAT(pid.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime from pro_info_draft pid left join pro_team_draft pt on pid.id = pt.draft_pro_id where 1=1 and pid.status = 0
and ( pt.user_id = #{userId} or pid.create_user_id = #{userId})
and pid.pro_name like concat('%',#{proName},'%')
AND pid.pro_type IN
#{item}
order by pid.create_time DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_attach_draft
id,
pro_id,
real_file_name,
file_name,
file_path,
create_time,
pro_attach_type,
`status`,
upload_person_name,
upload_person_Id,
update_time
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{realFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{proAttachType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uploadPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uploadPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

insert into pro_attach_draft
id,
pro_id,
real_file_name,
file_name,
file_path,
create_time,
pro_attach_type,
`status`,
upload_person_name,
upload_person_Id,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{realFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{proAttachType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uploadPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uploadPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update pro_attach_draft
pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_file_name = #{realFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pro_attach_type = #{proAttachType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_person_name = #{uploadPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_person_Id = #{uploadPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id,pro_id as proId, real_file_name as realFileName,file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, pro_attach_type as proAttachType, status as status,upload_person_name as uploadPersonName, upload_person_Id as uploadPersonId, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime from pro_attach_draft
1=1
and pro_id = #{proId}
and pro_attach_type in (${proAttachType})
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_layer_draft
pro_id,
`level`,
amount,
proportion,
issueRate,
proTerm,
averageTerm,
create_time,
#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{proportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{issueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{averageTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update pro_layer_draft
pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`level` = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
proportion = #{proportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
issueRate = #{issueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proTerm = #{proterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
averageTerm = #{averageterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pro_id as proId, level,amount,proportion,issueRate,proTerm,averageTerm from pro_layer_draft where pro_id = #{proId}
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_team_draft
id,
pro_id,
draft_pro_id,
user_id,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{draftProId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update pro_team_draft
pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
draft_pro_id = #{draftProId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT pt.id,pt.user_id as userId,su.username, su.fullname as fullName FROM pro_info_draft pro LEFT JOIN pro_team_draft pt ON pro.id = pt.draft_pro_id LEFT JOIN sec_user su ON pt.user_id = su.id WHERE pro.id = #{proId}
SELECT pm.id,pm.code,pm.name FROM pro_model pm LEFT JOIN pro_model_relation_draft pmr ON pm.id = pmr.model_id WHERE pmr.pro_id = #{proId}
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_info_trade_structure_draft
pro_id,
underlying_assets_type,
underlying_assets_standard,
ratio_amount,
fund_arrangements,
term_investment,
rate_investment,
rating_result,
is_original_list,
is_original_buyback,
breach_content,
breach_compare,
total_fund_amount,
seed_fund_proportion,
estimated_management_fee,
scope_investment,
risk_arrangement,
#{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{underlyingAssetsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{underlyingAssetsStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ratioAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fundArrangements,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{termInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rateInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ratingResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isOriginalList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isOriginalBuyback,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{breachContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{breachCompare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalFundAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seedFundProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{estimatedManagementFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scopeInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{riskArrangement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update pro_info_trade_structure_draft set
pro_id=#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
underlying_assets_type=#{underlyingAssetsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
underlying_assets_standard=#{underlyingAssetsStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ratio_amount=#{ratioAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund_arrangements=#{fundArrangements,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
term_investment= #{termInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rate_investment= #{rateInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rating_result= #{ratingResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_original_list= #{isOriginalList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_original_buyback= #{isOriginalBuyback,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
breach_content= #{breachContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
breach_compare= #{breachCompare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_fund_amount= #{totalFundAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seed_fund_proportion= #{seedFundProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estimated_management_fee= #{estimatedManagementFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scope_investment= #{scopeInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
risk_arrangement= #{riskArrangement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id ,pro_id ,underlying_assets_type ,underlying_assets_standard ,ratio_amount ,fund_arrangements ,term_investment ,rate_investment ,rating_result ,is_original_list ,is_original_buyback ,breach_content ,breach_compare ,total_fund_amount ,seed_fund_proportion ,estimated_management_fee ,scope_investment ,risk_arrangement ,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time ,DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time from pro_info_trade_structure_draft where pro_id = #{proId}

SELECT pa.id, pa.pro_id, pa.file_name, pa.file_path, pa.real_file_name, pa.pro_attach_type, pa.create_time, pa.update_time, pa.`status`, pa.upload_person_name, pa.upload_person_Id FROM pro_attach_draft pa
pa.status = '00' and pa.pro_id = #{proId}
and pa.pro_attach_type in (${proAttachType})
order by create_time asc
